_comments.mysql: MySQL connection settings (user needs CREATE, DROP, INSERT, SELECT permissions)
_comments.module: Module name to export from (any module works - just the name, e.g. 'default', 'my-module', etc.)
_comments.tswowInstallPath: Path to your TSWoW installation (contains modules/ folder)
_comments.tswowSourcePath: Path to the tswow source repository (for reading DBC schemas from tswow-scripts)
